Class Like

java.lang.Object
fr.polytech.picknpic.bl.models.Like
public class Like extends Object
Represents a like in the Pick'n'Pic application. A like can be associated with a post, photo, or comment.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Like(int userId, int postId, int photoId, int commentId)
    Constructs a new Like instance.

    Gets the ID of the post that was liked.

  • Constructor Details

    • Like

      public Like(int userId, int postId, int photoId, int commentId)
      Constructs a new Like instance. A like can concern only a photo, a post, or a comment. Assign the concerned object's ID to its value and other IDs to -1.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user who liked the post, photo, or comment.
      postId - The ID of the post that was liked.
      photoId - The ID of the photo that was liked.
      commentId - The ID of the comment that was liked.

  • Method Details

    • getCommentId

      public int getCommentId()
      Gets the ID of the comment that was liked.
      Returns:
      the comment ID.
